hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e -v rm -rf codechecker-results rm -rf obj-firefox/
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j16" mk_add_options AUTOCLOBBER=1 mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR=@TOPSRCDIR@/obj-firefox EOF ./mach clobber
awk '{print "-*"$1"*"}' tools/rewriting/ThirdPartyPaths.txt > skip.list cat >> skip.list <<EOF -/usr/* -*/xpcom/tests/* -*/mfbt/tests/* -*/dom/bindings/Test* EOF #source ~/checker_env/bin/activate source ~/workspace/update-codechecker/venv/bin/activate pip install thrift==0.11.0 pip install psycopg2 export PATH=~/workspace/update-codechecker/build/CodeChecker/bin:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin/:$PATH nohup bash ~/run-server-codechecker.sh & cat ~/workspace/update-codechecker/build/CodeChecker/config/package_layout.json #CHECKS=$(CodeChecker checkers|awk '{print "-e " $2}' |grep -v -E "(alpha\.|osx\.|debug\.|google-readability-casting|llvm-include-order|google-readability-braces-around-statements)"|tr "\n" " ") #CodeChecker check --postgresql --dbusername codechecker_user -j 13 -u suppress.txt --keep-tmp -s skip.list $CHECKS -n firefox_$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M") -b "hg pull -u && hg update -r default && ./mach build -j 12"
#CodeChecker check --postgresql --dbusername codechecker_user -j 13 -u suppress.txt --keep-tmp -s skip.list -n firefox_$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M") -b "hg pull -u && hg update -r default && ./mach build -j 12"
CHECKERS=$(CodeChecker checkers |awk '{print "--enable " $1}'|grep -v -E '(google-readability-todo|android-|hicpp-no-assembler|fuchsia-|debug\.)') echo $CHECKERS
./mach configure ./mach build pre-export export ./mach build-backend -b CompileDB #CodeChecker check --verbose debug -j 13 -b "hg pull -u && hg update -r default && ./mach build -j 23" -o codechecker-results $CHECKERS --timeout 120 --skip skip.list #--verbose debug CodeChecker check -j 13 --logfile obj-firefox/compile_commands.json -o codechecker-results $CHECKERS --timeout 120 --skip skip.list CodeChecker store codechecker-results/ -n firefox_$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M") --url firefox #rm -rf obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/ rm -rf obj-firefox/
